verses.name: Job 2:6
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Satan, Behold, he is in thine hand; but save his life.

verses.name: Job 2:7
verses.text: So went Satan forth from the presence of the Lord, and smote Job with sore boils from the sole of his foot unto his crown.

verses.name: Job 2:8
verses.text: And he took him a potsherd to scrape himself withal; and he sat down among the ashes.

verses.name: Job 2:9
verses.text: Then said his wife unto him, Dost thou still retain thine integrity? curse God, and die.
